title: Yamiche Alcindor | Trump Wants His Coronavirus Failures to Be “Quickly Forgotten”: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the president and his allies trying to wish away the coronavirus pandemic and hoping everyone forgets he botched the response to the crisis.

Then, he talks to reporter Yamiche Alcindor, who covers the White House for PBS NewsHour.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
